import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const EditKlient = () => { const [data,setData]=useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', address:'', image:'' }) const navigate=useNavigate(); const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8081/editKlient' + id) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) const handleSubmit=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); } return (

Update

setData({...data, name: e.target.value})} value={data.name}/>
setData({...data, email: e.target.value})} value={data.email}/>
setData({...data, address: e.target.value})} value={data.address}/>
setData({...data,image:e.target.files[0]})}/>
) } export default EditKlient
